rows.label: qst201203_msg0001
rows.name: Hey, why did you run away?

rows.label: qst201203_msg0002
rows.name: Eek! N-Nii-chan!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0003
rows.name:
D-Don't worry! Your
Nii-chan will protect you!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0004
rows.name: Hey now, we're not going to-

rows.label: qst201203_msg0005
rows.name:
...You wish to fight? ...I
cannot promise to hold back.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0006
rows.name: W-Waaaaaahh!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0007
rows.name:
Seori, what are you doing,
scaring them like that?

rows.label: qst201203_msg0008
rows.name: ...I felt killing intent.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0009
rows.name: Oh, for...! Seori, just stand back.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0010
rows.name:
...It's all right. We're
not going to hurt you.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0011
rows.name: ...Really?

rows.label: qst201203_msg0012
rows.name:
Yes, really. But why
did you run from us?

rows.label: qst201203_msg0013
rows.name: ...Our dad's a hauler here in town.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0014
rows.name:
But last year, he got attacked
by a pair of Blades...

rows.label: qst201203_msg0015
rows.name:
A lot of his buddies got
hurt, and our dad barely
escaped with his life...

rows.label: qst201203_msg0016
rows.name: ...A pair of Blades.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0017
rows.name:
He said the Blades were girls, both
had eyepatches, and used ice and
water. He said they were vicious.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0018
rows.name:
That was you, wasn't it?! You're
girls, and you both have eyepatches!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0019
rows.name:
...No, it's not... It was
us, but it wasn't...us.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0020
rows.name:
Stay back! I won't let you
lay a finger on Veero!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0022
rows.name:
Mikumari, I think it's best we
leave these children alone.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0023
rows.name: We may not remember it...

rows.label: qst201203_msg0024
rows.name:
...but the fact is that
we've hurt many people.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0025
qst201203_msg0027
rows.name:
Let's go, Mikumari. We
shouldn't be here...

rows.label: qst201203_msg0029
rows.name: Wait, you two.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0030
rows.name:
That might've been true in the
past, but the two of you now
aren't bad people at all!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0031
rows.name: We're the ones who know that best.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0032
rows.name:
The past cannot be changed,
but the present can.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0033
rows.name:
The mistakes you have
made can be atoned for.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0034
rows.name:
That's right. If you just
explain properly, the
townspeople will understand.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0035
rows.name: Oh... you're right!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0036
rows.name:
My past self might have been a
villain, but we're different now!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0037
rows.name:
...Say, could we have a
word with your father?

rows.label: qst201203_msg0038
rows.name:
W-Why?! Are you gonna
hurt our dad again?!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0039
rows.name: No! We'd never do that!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0040
rows.name:
I want to apologize to
your father and everyone
else for what happened.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0041
rows.name: I want them to know who we are now!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0042
rows.name:
Mikumari, do you have any idea how
many people we might have hurt?

rows.label: qst201203_msg0043
rows.name: It's impossible...

rows.label: qst201203_msg0044
rows.name:
We still have to do it, Seori! We
committed sins that demand it.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0045
rows.name:
It'll be fine, we can do this!
I'll be right there with you!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0046
rows.name: ...Mikumari...

rows.label: qst201203_msg0047
rows.name: We'll be with ye, too, of course.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0048
rows.name:
That's right. You're our friends.
We can't just leave you to it.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0049
rows.name:
It's fine. The way you two
are now, I'm sure the
townspeople will accept you.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0050
rows.name:
...All right. If you all feel
so strongly, I'll go along.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0051
rows.name:
Though I still think
it's a waste of time...

rows.label: qst201203_msg0052
rows.name:
See? Now you understand that these
girls aren't bad people, right?

rows.label: qst201203_msg0053
rows.name:
How about it? Think ye
could take us to your dad?

rows.label: qst201203_msg0054
rows.name: ...Nii-chan?

rows.label: qst201203_msg0055
rows.name: ...Okay.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0056
rows.name: I don't think you're lying...

rows.label: qst201203_msg0057
rows.name:
If you promise not to do anything
to our dad, I'll take you to him.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0058
rows.name: Really?! Of course, we promise!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0059
rows.name:
Dad's at Fons Maim Port.
Let's go together.
